About me

I'm a Web Developer based in Manresa (Barcelona), with 5 years of agency experience mostly on brand & product websites, and another 3 years freelancing.

Background

I studied Computer Engineering at UAB where even getting my Final Project with honors, I never actually had my Bachelor's Degree because I got stuck in last year's Compilers II course.

My skills

This is an alphabetically ordered list of technologies I'm confident enough to work with in a professional production environment. I'm not gonna draw some fancy graph here saying I know 92% HTML or 84% JavaScript. Because what on earth does that even mean?

  • Angular 2
  • AWS
  • CoffeeScript
  • CSS
  • Express
  • GeoServer
  • Git
  • Gulp
  • HTML
  • JavaScript
  • MongoDB
  • MySQL
  • Node.js
  • Open Layers 3
  • PHP
  • PostGIS
  • TypeScript
  • Wordpress

On the other side, this is an (obviously) incomplete list of widely used languages and technologies I do not excel at. I know almost nothing of some of them and I could probably work with some others without great effort. Anyway, if you're looking for a ninja in something listed here, honestly, I'm not your guy.

  • C#
  • C++
  • Drupal
  • Go
  • Java
  • Joomla
  • Python
  • Ruby on Rails
  • Ruby
  • Unity3D

How to contact me

For professional approaches, e-mail is my first choice. So, even if you got my number, please e-mail me at hola@jordinebot.cat. If needed, you'll find my PGP Public Key as well as verified profiles and domains at Keybase.
